revised_title: Optimizing Compass Needles for Navigation: Material, Form, and Magnetization Techniques
tldr: Captain Henry Kater investigates the best material and form for compass needles, focusing on sheer steel and the pierced rhombus shape. He also explores magnetization techniques and the relationship between needle length, directive force, and surface area. Kater's research aims to improve navigation instruments, particularly in the context of polar expeditions.
